structure.unit: Real And Personal Property And Domestic Relations
Descent And Distribution, Wills, Estates Of Deceased Persons And Absentees, Guardianship, Conservatorship And Trusts
Sales, Mortgages And Leases Of Real Estate By Executors, Administrators, Guardians And Conservators

law.text: Real estate not devised shall be first chargeable with the payment of debts, legacies or charges of administration in exoneration of real estate devised, unless a different intention appears by the will.
